amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow residents of public housing to appeal any ruling of a local housing management authority grievance board to an impartial regional appeals board created by local housing and management authorities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that residents of public housing be entitled to appeal any ruling of a local housing management authority grievance board to an impartial Regional Appeals Board to be created by local housing and management authorities.The amendm ent would specify that public housing tenants be represented on the appeals board.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
